title: The Mill on the Floss - portrayal of relationship

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Eliot uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex portrayal of Tom and Maggie’s relationship.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Eliot uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex portrayal of Tom and Maggie’s relationship.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
